text: Stanley Aronowitz (January 6, 1933 - August 16, 2021) was an American academic and sociologist. He taught cultural studies, and urban education at the City University of New York Graduate Center. He was also a political activist and cultural critic. Aronowitz died on August 16, 2021 in New York City, aged 88. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Academics from New York City Category:American sociologists Category:Scientists from New York City Category:American political activists
title: Stanley Aronowitz
